pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate Healthy Eating Index (HEI) Scores // Calculates Healthy Eating Index (HEI) scores for National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey (NHANES) data sets to facilitate analysis of demographic and dietary differences. For more information on the HEI metric, refer to Guenther et al. (2014) doi:10.3945/jn.113.183079.
